desc: Movie website displaying latest Movies and TV Shows. Get access to thousands of latest films overview and release dates from up to date API endpoints. Search through the catalogue from the search bar.
A news update site that gives football fans up to date news on their favourite clubs. Get all the transfer news as they happen

View countries details including name, flag, city, population and region. You can also filter based on the region the country is in or even search with their key name and get a single result based on the search keyword.
A filterable list where one can filter through developers by their programming language skill.
Dictionary app that returns multiple meanings of a specified keyword
